author: mreutegg
msg: - Change prefix for xpath functions. Use jcr (which maps to the jcr namespace) instead of jcrfn.
- Contains function now has two required parameters. Implementations must at least support: XPath: jcr:contains(., 'text'), SQL: CONTAINS(*, 'text')

author: jorton
msg: * support/ab.c (test): Treat POST data as a binary blob not a C
